name: Flip Flop Hop
description:
Blobbert has lost track of his children!  Set out on a quest to find and return them safely to their home before his wife gets off work.

Use the power of his Flip Boots to make blue blocks phase in and out while avoiding hazards and solving puzzles to recover Blobbert's (many) offspring.

Controls for keyboard or gamepad:

Move - Left/Right Arrow Keys, Left Analog stick

Jump (hold to jump higher) - Spacebar, A button

Reload Level - R Key

Quit - Esc Key
